Have you come seeking the Floating Stone?
So many attempt this task, but seldom more than once.

This is the Medium Path. To reach your goal, you'll need the assistance of someone on the Cliff Path as well.
If you doubt your abilities, you may want to reconsider your plan. The challenges on this path are unpredictable, and intense.

To open the door, you'll need 2 teams.
One to destroy the monument on this path,
and another to do the same on the Cliff Path.

Fair warning, the monsters here are much stronger
than those in other regions. So be careful!
